Summary: Myself and another co worker saw the same shape come over the top of us.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in St. Louis
There were no other sightings in St. Louis on or around September 12th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsit was around 6:15 AM we were standing out side loadeing a trailer when i just happen to look north west lokking to the city of st louis when i saw a black odject it looked like it was real high up in the air it was moving fast it came directly over the top of us both my co worker at first thought it was a ballon but it was moving way to fast to be a ballon when it got directly over us we saw the shape of a sphire with a cone like front on it i saw a program on the travel channel that discribed the same looking object from a while back it was gone just as fast as we saw it it traveled in a south dir
